Sitescope monitoring for admin servers

  • Make sure SNMP is configured correctly.
  • Create a user called sitescop
    sudo useradd -u 5069 sitescop
  • Setup a SSH keys
    sudo su - sitescop
mkdir -p .ssh
chmod 700 .ssh
cd .ssh
wget  http://apps/sitescope/authorized_keys.sitescop
mv authorized_keys.sitescop authorized_keys
chmod 644 authorized_keys
